channel.title: Setup | KubeVault CLI on Tools for running HashiCorp Vault on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Setup | KubeVault CLI on Tools for running HashiCorp Vault on Kubernetes

item.title: Install KubeVault CLI
item.description: New to KubeVault? Please start here. Installation Guide In order to install KubeVault CLI as kubectl-plugin, download the kubectl-vault binary and move it anywhere on you PATH. macOS Linux Windows macOS $ wget -O kubectl-vault https://github.com/kubevault/cli/releases/download/0.1.0/kubectl-vault-darwin-amd64 \ && chmod +x kubectl-vault \ && sudo mv kubectl-vault /usr/local/bin/ Linux $ wget -O kubectl-vault https://github.com/kubevault/cli/releases/download/0.1.0/kubectl-vault-linux-amd64 \ && chmod +x kubectl-vault \ && sudo mv kubectl-vault /usr/local/bin/ Windows Download the latest release v0.
